message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs. With its advanced features and unparalleled quality, it's truly an investment that will pay off in the long run. Considering its value and the benefits it offers, I would like to extend this exclusive offer to you at a price of $10,000.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. While I appreciate the value of the product, my budget for this is closer to $6,000. Would you be willing to consider that price?

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your position and I'm willing to work towards a mutually beneficial solution. Given the high value of the product and the benefits it provides, I would like to counter your offer with a price of $7,500. This still allows us to maintain a reasonable profit margin while making the product accessible to you.
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate.  To be honest, $7,000 is the absolute highest I can go.  If that's agreeable to you, I'm ready to close the deal.
